column3: â€œğŸ¤—ğŸŒ² MediHaze is the ULTIMATE wake & bake strain! I didn't know what to expect so I made sure it was a strain I tried with a freshly rested mind. The smell and taste was very spicy and earthy... honestly kind of reminds me of the old school pretendo that used to float around. The high is fantatsic. There needs to be more CBD in strains because for such a low percentage of THC (4.76%), MediHaze has a wonderful high an...â€

â€œMediHaze, (aka Boaty McBoatface)  The strain I got was double the CBD from Tweed. Nice smell, smooth smoke, effects come on around 10-15mins later. Nice and alert, good low dose thc makes the head tingle a little but great for daytime and being social. Uplifting high and a great pain reliever. A perfect intro for people new to medical marijuana about feeling the psychoactive effects. So this for me (new here) love it...â€

â€œI got this under the name Boaty McBoatface from Tweed with 4/9 thc/cbd. This is a great beginner strain. It helps with my physical pain and keeps my anxiety at bay, while maintaining a clear head. No feeling high, just a pleasant, comfortable, chillness. 
It does cause me major dry mouth, very mild (and tolerable) nausea, and suppresses my appetite.â€
â€œI was looking for something, ANYTHING , to alleviate nausea from treatment and I am able to eat, keep it down AND still function!â€

â€œThis is one of my top 5. I'm always excited to see it on the menu, which around here (Roswell, NM) is every few months.

An incredibly relaxing strain. Calms my muscle spasms and makes me remember to eat...a lot. The munchies are strong with this one.â€

â€œMedi Haze is a great strain for daytime use, with a light, uplifting buzz which helps with focus.

Medi Haze has a strong, sweet strawberry/slightly skunky smell. The taste is similar, with a light peppery taste on the exhale. I vaporise this most days and it positively impacts my productivity at work, as well as my general mood. My partner suffers from stress and anxiety and found that this strain sent her straight ...â€

â€œI now know what it's like for cannabis to combat depression and fatigue. Sometimes I just wanna smoke weed that doesn't make me feel like I smoked weed. I feel physically energetic, clear headed, happy and normal." The high CBD makes it more difficult to accidentally oversmoke and crash. No dizzies
column5: sleepys or munchies. My new favorite wake n' bake!!! Later in the day
column6: it's an easy come down with the help ...â€"

column3:
â€œI was skeptical of this strain at first because it was advertised as a CBD strain. Eventually, I decided to try a half-quarter (woops-an eighth for most of the pot-smoking community) to help with some back pain that I'd been prescribed relaxers for that I didn't fill.

Upon lighting up my first draw, two things became immediately apparent. First, this bud has a commanding smell of hazy citrus that pours out as soon a...â€

â€œCBD MediHaze is a pleasure to grow. It produces one of the most beautiful and sweetest smelling flowers I've ever grown; they're a tropical delight. This strain works well for both SOG and SCROG techniques. It takes to topping well.
I've used its fresh picked leaves and flowers in smoothies with great success. It's great uplifting and body healing medicine. Vaping a properly conditioned bud is a pleasure too. It has ...â€

â€œthis strain is far best for my joint and body pain but didn't knock me out which is good I suffer from PTSD and it has seemed to calm my mind as well. highly recommend if you suffer from anxiety, PTSD or pain.â€

â€œMedihaze from Patriot Care in Boston is currently my favorite strain for medicinal use and in my top 5 for recreational use. It is a 2:1 CBD:THC and the THC percentage usually hovers in the 5-9% THC. It provides a great little head high but a amazing body high and a general overall effect. I use it for IBS and pain from a wrist surgery years ago. I have gone down the opiate route ( I was on them before surgery but wa...â€

â€œThis is my number one daytime strain for fatigue, anxiety, and depression. I got this at The Kings of Canna with 16.3% CBD and 4.3% THC. Just one or two hits in the morning and the same again at lunch and I'm nicely productive during the day. No munchies, no paranoia, just clear, better energy and focus. Otherwise I'm exhausted all day. Gotta love that limonene sativa high CBD low THC mix.â€
â€œGreat cbd strain, a very chill, mellow high. I love this flower for after physical therapy. Great for painâ€

â€œI LOVE this strain!!! Smooth on the throat and lungs. Great pain reliever, too. I've been trying different strains to find the right ones for my conditions. I was recently diagnosed with Trigeminal Neuralgia that is labeled the worse pain a person can ever feel. This strain has allowed me to focus, get creative when needed and takes away the twinges of pain when they breakthrough... without being glued at all. I can ...â€

â€œI know some people look at low thc% like it's an exposed old man crack, but I love this strain.

I got the Medi-Haze from Nectar on 33rd and Sandy. thc% 5.26/cbd%15.3

Sticky, crystal coated soft buds with orange hairs throughout. So fragrant! When I opened the container I thought this smells so right it can't be wrong." And it was right bra! Smells of sweet pine and spicy mint flood your nostrils.

â€œThese large marshmallow nuggets are a rare strain of their own.  with a high CBD and relatively lower THC content you are able to kill two birds with one stone - Pun intended. Great strain for medical patients or newbies looking for pain relief with out any negative side effects.  The high is very mild making it ideal for day use.  This is perhaps one of the most interesting body highs I have experienced.  On every o...â€

â€œGreat for my pain from rheumatoid arthritis and painfully swollen legs from venous insufficiency.  Relaxing, non-distracting, peaceful product.  It takes no more than a piece of a bud in a hash pipe for me for a restful night.  My pain often makes getting comfortable enough to go to sleep difficult.  MediHaze is lovely.â€

â€œThese large marshmallow nuggets are a rare strain of their own.  with a high CBD and relatively lower THC content you are able to kill two birds with one stone - Pun intended. Great strain for medical patients or newbies looking for pain relief with out any negative side effects.  The high is very mild making it ideal for day use.  This is perhaps one of the most interesting body highs I have experienced.  On every o...â€

â€œFirst review Iâ€™ve ever felt I needed to post on a strain... because MediHaze is that good. I suffer from tension headaches as well as migraines, and this strain relieves pain so fast. Iâ€™ve tried a lot of different CBD strains and this is by far the best. I definitely think the THC content boosts the pain relief. The buzz is nice and light, just enough to remind you that you smoked, but still be productive. Highly rec...â€

â€œThis is the first high-CBD strain that I've tried and it took about 3/4's of a bowl before I really felt the relaxing effects. Keeping in mind I smoke all exclusively minimal cbd bud(0.0-1.0%) usually, this was a suprisingly delightful strain it relaxed me without putting me to sleep which is strange for a strain with 19% CBD.

Great strain, Great Grower (Orgrow)â€
â€œThe MediHaze I purchased has a 1:2 THC/CBD ratio (5.03% THC, 10.3% CBD). I found the strain very mellow, easy, relaxing.â€

â€œThis is my daytime medicine. Simply amazing, doesnâ€™t get me super duper stoned (which I prefer at night) and therefore helps me function throughout the day. I find with some sativas, I tend to get tired later in the day. However with Medihaze Iâ€™m energetic and stress free. AWESOME if you like to stay active while still enjoying the psychoactive effect of cannabis.â€

â€œIncredible strain. Without a doubt the best study aid I have ever used. It puts you in the zone, increases focus, and definitely helps with information recall. I love using it when I study (grad student) or just when I'm reading.â€
â€œOnly found this locally once but it was clear, happy, and killed my pain. Would like to find again.â€

â€œI'm very happy with this selection.

 It leaves me clear-headed, yet utterly relaxed and anxiety free. 

This strain would be great for depression and anxiety. This is the best that I have tried so far..â€

â€œI've just recently gotten my Massachusetts medical certification but I've been a daily cannabis consumer for over 20 years now. I don't have much experience with the cbd strains (or if I do I didn't know). Really enjoyed this strain. 27% TAC with a 1:2 thc:cbd ratio. Spicy notes on the inhale with a slight peppery taste on the exhale. Good for my after work medicating  (I'm a commercial Glass worker with chronic back...â€

â€œKinda like Super Silver Haze, but light on the THC and very high on the CBD. I don't really know what else I could ask for in a strain. Great flavor, easy to focus mentally, and massive gains in managing pain and anxiety. My go-to strain for regular, day to day life activities.â€
â€œLight and airy feeling.  No pain at all.  Shallow skin tingling.  Hyper focus at times.  Good for chilling!!â€
â€œExcellent for anxiety and wipes away any paranoia.â€
â€œWhile the batch I have is only 3.5% THC and 12% CBD, it helps a lot more for my anxiety than a lot of other strains.â€

â€œThe stain I used was 2:1 CBD. I wasn't crazy about the taste, a bit sharp and pungent, but it wasn't horrible either. The head effects are mild, calming but alert. The body effects took about 30 minutes to get full strength; starting  by numbing my face and eventually the whole body felt relaxed and a bit tingley. A definite improvement over the chronic pain I deal with. I took this at bedtime so I will see how sleep...â€
â€œOnly found this locally once but it was clear, happy, and killed my pain. Would like to find again.â€
â€œOnly found this locally once but it was clear, happy, and killed my pain. Would like to find again.â€

â€œIf you can call it a sativa then this is my favorite one. 


Most sativa's claim to keep you  Energized " when usually what you get is just good 'ol plain fashioned STONED. Medihaze will change all that.

column1: The smoke was sort of spicy and earthy and although usually I dont like that flavor profile ... this one wasn't bad at all. It had a moderate throat hit that was very tolerable.
I took about half a bowl and had ...â€"

column3: â€œThe effect of this strain really helps with my medical needs; I love the fact that it is high in CBD. I'm not a fan of the taste though but that's my preference; still a smooth smoke though.â€

â€œThis is my favorite strain so far. It is very relaxing and uplifting. It seems to help calm my inflammatory skin disease too. My eczema is much better now. And I feel happier and everything seems brighter and clearer!â€

â€œThe higher CBD content in CBD Medihaze allows for an uplifted state without feeling too high" or having any type of paranoia. Personally an enjoyable choice if you're looking for something that allows you to easily go about your day.â€"
â€œHold my beer." -CBD Mango Haze
â€œThis is my go to for every day use . . . excellent for pain reduction and helps with inflammation and energy.  Good for focus and general functioning without side effects.  Both smoke and vape.â€

â€œWith 15.3% CBD rating this is the highest Cannabidiol content I have found in any strain.  Put on top of that a content of 16.3% THC this is a strong candidate for Number One with an overall rating of 31.6%.  You can feel the density and resin content readily and with  its sweet aroma and taste it's definitely in the top THREE of my favorites.  It also does not have such a strong nighttime affect as other high conten...â€
â€œOne of my favorites. The strain I bought had a 1-2 ratio (5.03% THC, 10.3% CBD), which I found ideal: the best effects of a mild THC high mixed with the mellow comfort of a high CBD strain.â€
â€œCurrent favorite! Light, easy on the head, makes me feel more social than usual.â€

â€œWow, Medihaze is definitely a Sativa! I smoked this for the first time tonight and I couldn't keep still. All I wanted to be was up and active and I would highly recommend this for those who enjoy productivity. Aside from the great service this was an amazing first haul.â€

The Phenotype that we grow has been tested in a Health Canada approved laboratory where it yielded 17 To 1 CBD over THC. That is in this case 17 % CBD and less than 1% THC.   This is no big fish story as I will post pics o...â€

â€œI'm new to medical marijuana but this was recommended to me as Boaty McBoatface at Tweed. It's definitely a nice daytime strain, very mild but pleasant buzz. I have Fibromyalgia and literally all the co-morbid disorders, so I have a lot going on. For me, I felt much more relaxed, and it helped dull out some of the pain, but if I'm honest, I wish it worked better on the serious muscle spasms/soreness. I do love that I...â€

â€œHigh CBD and CBG content in this strain, as well as moderate THC levels make this strain a great all around medication; great for Bipolar Disorder in particular, and I'm sure glaucoma. Hard skunk flavor, with a medicinal sweetness.â€

I love the flavor, like Christmas trees with a bit of pepper.  While this doesnâ€™t take away my pain completely, it helps me to manage lower back pain during the day and be a bit more mobile.â€
â€œDefinitely one of my faves. Has the best of both of the CBD and THC worlds. True Authentic Medicine.â€

â€œMy new favorite strain. The high is perfect. Just a little bit of dry eye and dry mouth, to start. I'm so happy that I chased the high all the way from the first time I tried Super Sour Desiel, to Super Silver Haze, to Haze and now to this Medi Haze. It's amazing, I may not want to try any other strain again. Find something you like and smoke it's parents until you find that feeling. Just brilliantâ€‹.â€

â€œFirst time using this strain, the taste doesnâ€™t bother me, but it makes me kind of lightheaded and dizzy for the first 30 minutes. Then, I relax. others report being hungry, but it doesnâ€™t do that for me.â€

â€œNot good for me, initial locked/wired crash fir a couple hours, then slightly wired for 22 to 18 hours. Comedown left me with upset stomach and drowsiness. It may be CBD but too sativa.â€
â€œCurrently my all time favourite strain. The best daily driver hands down, I will never tire of this one. Highly recommendedâ€

â€œA must have. My new stand by. Lots of heads using  these CBD flower strains as a base by which to add favorite Sativas and Indicas but I really appreciate effect that this single constituent produces whence smoked. 

Hallmarks: NOT stoned or high rather, up lifted, clear minded, and enthusiastic, with a buffered pain response.

and my body doth ache..
But things sure come together

â€œGood strain to relax and unwind withâ€
â€œThis strain hits fast and relaxes my body with almost no head high whatsoever. It's great for taking off the edge".â€"

â€œThe buds are fragrant, both sweet and skunky on the nose with a tinge of orange.  The flower delivers the same flavor profile.  The orange is delicious.  Very smooth hits, great nugget structure, and very fresh buds.  Grinder recommended.  The high is energetic and manageable, with mild pain-killing effects, a great all day long smoker.  That, paired with the flavor will definitely keep me coming back for more!
#420s...â€

â€œTargets very well the neck and spinal chord.  So it seems to offer therapy in that region of the body. I felt my chord tingle for 2 days straight. However it disturbed my sleep for 2 days straight and it accompanied eerie thoughts; hence minus two stars. (Vap'd 338-344 F)â€

â€œDefinitely a body high. Mine lasted about 2 hours with the 1st hour being numb from my shoulders to my knees. Didn't experience any unexpected Anxiety or paranoia during or after the high. Definitely experienced dry mouth. Got extremely sleepy about 4 hours after smoking. Overall, it's probably a good pain killer; especially muscle achesâ€
â€œhe'll yeah smoked some MediHaze with the homie before work. It got me super energized and I feel no pain and I'm super happy. Cannabis it never stops satisfying.â€
â€œSo goodâ€

â€œAwesome find! If you enjoy sativas then you will love this strain. Great for morning, afternoon, and general day time. Scent was pungent pine and flowery. An active, buzzy cerebral high that uplifts your energy and puts you in a cheery state of being! Although at the same time it feels strangely relaxing, more so compared to other sativas. 

Look: 5/5 (bright green, bright orange hairs)
Scent: 4/5 
High: 5/5
Burnout:...â€

â€œMediHaze is like having a nice glass of wine to relax at the end of the evening. Your mind maintains clarity, but the body relaxes throughout. Anxiety and pain melts away as you are able to maintain focus on whatever task you have at hand. The effects seem to wear off after around 2 or so.â€
â€œGave me a swell of energy that slowly took over. Didn't realize how much happier I was feeling until an hour in. Doesn't have many cerebral effects for me.â€

â€œI hadn't smoked in a long time before ordering this strain from Tweed. I chose this Medihaze for the low THC content because I have been known to get paranoid/anxious in the past. I was pleasantly surprised with the high. It was mellow and energetic at the same time and it totally took care of my anxiety. Great for a beginner.â€

â€œI now know how cannabis can combat depression. I love smoking weed that doesn't make me feel like I smoked weed. I'm physically energetic, uplifted, clear, and normal." The high CBD on this makes it more difficult to accidentally oversmoke and crash. Delightful. Just delightful.â€"
â€œI had flower CBD version from Patriot Care. It comes with a slight passing anxiety/mental circus but not consistently. Happy feeling and alert, I like it. ğŸ‘ğŸ»â€

â€œAwesome strain. Out of 2 seeds, I got a pair of incredible CBD phenos, fast and tall growth. Great daily time strain, perfect for pain relief, focusing, anti-anxiety. The only bad point is that yield is a bit less than average. Tottally worth tho and a must-have strain on my garden.â€
â€œFound this strain at breeze botanical in Ashland Oregon, absolutely love it ! Very mellow high for day or night! Reduces stress immediately!â€

â€œThis was my first CBD-dominant strain, and it helped me realize that my symptoms are best treated with THC. It gave me a headache immediately and worsened my nausea, stomach cramps and anxiety. I noticed frequent muscle spasms in my arms and legs for several hours after smoking. It also suppressed my appetite, which I know some people prefer, but I usually use MMJ to boost mine. I didn't notice much of a difference i...â€
â€œI just got this recently and am loving it. It helped so much with my social anxiety, I was able to feel clear headed and give a class presentation without wanting to cry.â€
â€œRelaxing with mild psychoactive effectâ€

â€œUsually with higher CBD strains, I get a little bit of a feeling after doing a lot of it but it doesn't usually seam worth it. But I keep trying them, because I've been wanting to find a good daytime strain that I can feel comfortable smoking/vaping anytime without getting too weird or overwhelmed. I think I found it! This strain really seamed to me like having a few beers and getting really happy, without the comedo...â€
â€œGreat strain!â€

â€œsuper sweet smell. amost like mango.
very clear headed, and relaxing. grounding. great for people who dont want to be overstoned. also does still give a nice little head high.â€
â€œThis is an amazing flower. Smells sweet and fruity. Very smooth while vaping. Instant relaxation. All stress melts away.â€
â€œwith this my pain levels are more relieved, this is an amazing strain!!â€
â€œhe'll yeah smoked some MediHaze with the homie before work. It got me super energized and I feel no pain and I'm super happy. Cannabis it never stops satisfying.â€
â€œAmazing pain relief and great taste, not big yelds but average... I love itâ€

â€œGreat strain for daytime use for people with social anxiety issues. I personally make oil and eat it in edibles and found that 1/2 ounce will get me 100 doses but I take 2 staggered by 15 minutes and I'm good for about 3 hours or so. Very happy social high with virtually no burn out!! Love the haze , any haze will do!!â€

â€œOne of the only sativas that I like! I'm a hardcore indica girl. This stuff wipes me clean, my brain is nice and blank. Sure, creativity would be nice, but I'm smoking it to get rid of bad thoughts. And this stuff will do it. Works on depression. Had a bit of anxiety but it went away quickly.â€
â€œpain relief. smokes well. would recommend.â€
â€œOutstanding. I typically avoid the lower THC strains, but with the high CBD content, this flower gets a big thumbs up for relaxation, meditation and it's fantastic for headaches.â€

â€œThis strain was my first encounter with high CBD bud, and it probably is not the strain for me. My bud tested at about 5% THC, 11% CBD. I took my standard number of vape hits to check it out. The taste was interesting, kind of a peppery soil flavor. There was just enough of a head high to make me feel paranoid and a little agitated for about an hour, and I got all warm and flushed. I didn't feel any significant pain ...â€

â€œThis is a very good strain for treating pain. I use this during the day and it allows me to remain quite functional while providing effective pain relief and an overall relaxed feeling. I have used the high CBD/low THC phenotype of this strain and I would definitely recommend it for moderate pain relief and stress relief.â€

â€œGreat strain!! Not much of a psychoactive feeling at all. Clearheaded buzz and great for pain and anxiety as well. Also helps to create an appetite for those that are looking for a non-psychoactive appetite boost. The one I got was 7% CBD and only a 2.41% THC content.â€

â€œI love this strain! Itâ€™s perfect for helping me unwind after the day. Itâ€™s also good for stress headaches. This is my go to most of the time as it enhances my concentration and chills me out enough to get stuff doneâ€

â€œTried this strain a few times. Still adjusting the dosage. The first few times, I never felt a heady effect which was nice for me. My heart did speed up for a few minutes. A warm relaxation washed over my whole body. Pain seemed to be far off. I took the stairs 2 at a time. so far, so good.â€
â€œLove this strain. I'm more of an indica guy but this strain is good. Pine sweet smell lifts you up and puts you in good mood. Light head high that will keep you up for the day.â€

â€œAs someone with chronic pain due to PTSD/GAD I have to say this strain is absolutely magical.

The CBD/THC ratio was about 2:1, though still low (6% to 10%) and yet after just a couple of little pipe hits I had instant relief. My back loosened up, muscle knots I had for years shrunk in size, and I was in a more relaxed state of mind. This strain has done wonders for me and I would highly suggest it for anyone in a si...â€
â€œSo lite... with intermittent hyper focus.  Slight  awareness to my eyes being tired; but, no pain at all!!!  No tension in body....just very shallow tingling.â€

â€œGreat for pain!â€
â€œReally mellow head change, great for uplifting a bad mood or energizing the body a bit. This makes my body feel so good!â€

â€œTastes so good! Definitely had a minty/pine after taste. Took my headache away quickly.â€

highly recommended for Sativa Lovers!â€

â€œI have a low tolerance and don't like high THC. This one is high CBD and lower THC and perfect for me.â€

â€œI love this strain.  Gets me feeling focused and clear minded.  If I'm having a really strong THC high I can take it down a notch with this strain's high CBD content - gives a more synergetic feeling to the overall high rather than an overpowering THC buzz.â€
â€œI'd like to give this bud 2 1/2 stars. It has sativa-like qualities, but not a very strong high. It is like immediately going into the mellow come down phase.â€

â€œFifty year old weed virgin here. This review is on behalf of Mrs. Mule, who is a PTSD patient and will be less than complete since it is more from my observation and less from my direct experience of this weed. As soon as she took some she started feeling a little sick to her stomach. My take on that is that she was getting first signs of immanent attack, triggered by the smoke. She then went to bed and within a few ...â€
